message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. I believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs. Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details.
Thank you for offering the premium product. I appreciate the quality and craftsmanship you mentioned. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our premium product, Bob. I understand your valuation and am willing to consider your proposal. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I would like to counteroffer at $125. This price reflects the value we place on the product and our commitment to providing quality items. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value and quality of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $110.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your consideration. In order to move forward, I would like to counteroffer at $115 for the product. This price still reflects our commitment to maintaining its value while reaching a fair agreement. Please let me know if this is agreeable.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I am willing to counteroffer at $112 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your flexibility. In light of this, I would like to counteroffer at $113 for the product. This price aims to strike a balance between our values and yours. I hope this is acceptable, and we can finalize the transaction.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $111 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a common ground. Based on our discussions, I would like to counteroffer at $112 for the product. This price reflects both the value we place on the item and your willingness to compromise. I hope this is satisfactory, and we can proceed with the sale.
